CustomField.description: Captures the logic based on position of the rule criteria For Example : if a rule had 3 criteria : Criteria 1, Criteria 2, Criteria 3 the Filter logic could be : 1 AND 2 OR 3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Captures the logic based on position of the rule criteria For Example : if a rule had 3 criteria : Criteria 1, Criteria 2, Criteria 3 the Filter logic could be : 1 AND 2 OR 3
CustomField.label: Filter Logic
